answers.answer: Good luck! Could be worse for sure. I have to go back and take a 2 hour test on wednesday because my first one came back a little high. They said it was still in the normal range just on the high side. I am assuming because diabetes runs in my family they are just double checking. Hopefully all goes well for you until your baby comes!!
Thank you.You are right- could definitely be worse!  Good luck to you too!
Great news been following your story we r due date twins
Thanks for the support ladies! I appreciate it! Number3andme- I'm on number 3 too!

question: Well I did better on the 3 hour glucose screen today but not perfect. I don't have full gestational diabetes but am glucose intolerant.  So I'll have to incorporate some mild daily exercise and have some diet modification so I don't develop diabetes.  Realistically it is what I should be doing anyway as I started this pregnancy over weight. Definitely want to do what's best for me and my sweet baby girl!
title: passed the three hour test. ..sort of
